column5: Was out on Sturgeon Lake today. Boat is in the water. Put in a second trolling motor battery and went for a quick spin around. Wather temperature is hovering around 49 degrees.
All parts even canals ar only 51
Pretty well the whole lake, went from the Bobcaygeon end, up halfway towards Fenlon Falls, then towards Goose Bay and then back.

All parts even canals ar only 51 Wow, that's cool for this time of the year. Any crappie action yet?  Pretty well the whole lake, went from the Bobcaygeon end, up halfway towards Fenlon Falls, then towards Goose Bay and then back. Oh, I thought you said "a quick tour" LOL
Those temps seem normal to me.
Once the canals get up to that 58Â° mark they'll be on big time but we need some warm sunny days.
How is crappie on Cameron lake this spring? it's great if they come back.
